summary: Just a simple but adorable husky companion with custom textures, new dark armour, and simple unique dialogue. Requires Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][/url][/b][/color][/color][/b][b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][color=#cc4125][size=6][b][/b][/size][/color][/b][/color][/color][/b][center][color=#cc4125][b][size=6]Mod works as intended, so don't expect any updates.[/size]
[b][size=4]I don't develop old mods any more.
[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/elianorapwnsu][img]http://i.imgur.com/267fYFk.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/c/Elianora][img]http://i.imgur.com/bGTVC9s.png[/img]
[/url][/b][/color]____________________________________________[/center][b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][b][color=#e69138][color=red][b]
[/b][/color][/color][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][color=#c27ba0]wow[/color][color=#ff00ff] [/color]
          [color=#ffd966] such mod[/color]
[color=#00ff00]very furreh[/color]
[color=#1e84cc] many bites[/color]
[color=#8e7cc3] wow[/color]
         [color=#00ffff]  awsum doge [/color][/size][/font][/b][/b][/color]
[/color][/b]
This idea just came up in the Nexus chat. Simplest of mods.. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8265935/?tb=mods&pUp=1]XBitu[/url] wanted a dog follower and I said a have a few house mods that have them. 
But then I realised I wanted a dog too, so I separated the dog from the rest of the (house) mod, Holmwood.

Originally he was Blade, a vampire hunter dog, but now he is Doge, an Altmer's best friend.
[b][color=#ff7700]Can be found in Riverwood, outside at the camp site, he will follow you once you activate him. [/color][/b]
Due to the custom dialogue there is no "Want to come with me?" thing.

[b]If you want him to stay ANYWHERE and treat it as home, just use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My Home Is Your Home[/url][/b]

[b][color=#cc4125][size=4]:: REQUIREMENTS ::[/size][/color][/b]
- Skyrim up to date
- Dawnguard DLC
[color=#f1c232]
[size=4][b]:: COMPATIBILITY ::[/b][/size][/color]
- ETaC
- My Home Is Your Home

[color=#e69138][size=4][b]:: FEATURES ::[/b]
[/size][/color]- A dog

[youtube]abjK4CwSoN8[/youtube]

[b][color=#cc4125][size=4]:: FAQ ::[/size][/color][/b]
Q: Doge is not following me and I can't talk to him!!!111oneone
A: Set your animal follower count to 0 (console [i]set playeranimalcount to 0[/i])

Q: STUPID EBIN NAME I HATE YOU YOU MEME USING LOSER!?!?1+111
A: [img]http://i.imgur.com/AjdKAU1.gif[/img]

Q; Very nice dark armour, Doge.
A: [img]http://i.imgur.com/OYgbFMf.gif[/img]

Q: He is OP.
A: He levels with the player.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bih6Oil.gif[/img]

Q: NOT LORE-FRIENDLY!!111oneone
A: [img]http://i.imgur.com/Tlrrw2c.gif[/img]

Q: HE IS NOT SHIBA! HE IS NOT TRUE DOGE! YOU FAIL!
A:  [img]http://i.imgur.com/tGyLnOV.gif[/img]

Q: THERE ARE 500 HUSKY MODS ALREADY, IT'S ENOUGH!!111oneone
A: Are there also enough human follower mods?
[img]http://i.imgur.com/e37XaNo.gif[/img]

[color=#e69138][size=4][b]:: CREDITS ::[/b][/size][/color]
[b][b][color=#c27ba0][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtYB2iX9_52X_DNtSIJXyWg]Darkfox127[/url][/color][/b] for his advanced followers tutorial and scripts[/b]
Aenkill: Doge HD fur texture and eyes

[color=#cc4125][size=4][b]:: PERMISSIONS ::[/b][/size][/color]
I don't want my work copied or spread. This file contains resources and assets that belong to other authors and I don't want anyone using (except personal use is fine, as long as you don't upload anything anywhere) them without proper credit.

I welcome translations of the file as long as:
A) The Nexus version is uploaded exclusively on this original mod's page
B) If the translation is uploaded somewhere else, I am notified of this upload, and you make sure the permissions and credits are listed correctly there.[/center]
author: Elianora
